original_title: Bruce Springsteen & the E Street Band: Live in Barcelona
overview: On October 16, 2002, two months into his world tour in support of The Rising, Bruce Springsteen & the E Street Band took the stage of the Palau Sant Jordi in Barcelona, Spain, to create the kind of soul-stirring concert experience that transforms Springsteen neophytes and fans alike into true believers.
title: Bruce Springsteen & the E Street Band: Live in Barcelona
